name: Cyber Gun
description:
Have you ever been so lonely that no one but yourself could save you from complete self-destruction? This game is just about that! Cyber Gun is a hardcore first-person shooter with platformer elements.

Features:
• Challenging levels that will make you pass them again and again
• Neon cyberpunk atmosphere
• Lots of interesting mechanics that make the gameplay more interesting: time dilation, jerks and much more
• Beautiful graphics
